recipes.title: Citrus Herb Roast Chicken
recipes.instructions: Pat chicken dry. Rub with olive oil, salt, pepper, and herbs. Stuff cavity with oranges and garlic. Roast at 400°F for 55-65 minutes until juices run clear. Rest 10 minutes before carving.

recipes.title: Spicy Coconut Ramen
recipes.instructions: Sauté ginger and garlic in oil. Stir in curry paste until fragrant. Pour in broth, coconut milk, and soy sauce; simmer 5 minutes. Add mushrooms and bok choy; cook until tender. Drop in noodles and cook 3 minutes. Finish with chili oil.

recipes.title: Summer Berry Overnight Oats
recipes.instructions: Combine oats, milk, yogurt, chia, honey, and vanilla in a jar. Stir in berries. Refrigerate overnight. Stir and top with fresh berries to serve.

recipes.title: Charred Corn & Avocado Salad
recipes.instructions: Char corn kernels in a hot skillet with a little oil until blistered. Toss with avocado, onion, jalapeño, cilantro, lime juice, olive oil, paprika, salt, and pepper. Serve slightly warm.
